text: Robert Redford (born Charles Robert Redford, Jr. on August 18, 1936), is a retired American movie actor, director, producer, businessman, and model. One of Hollywood's biggest superstars, Redford has kept his appeal as the decades pass. In August 2018, Redford officially announced his retirement from acting. == Movies == === Actor === * Inside Daisy Clover (1965) * This Property Is Condemned (1966) * The Chase (1966) * Barefoot in the Park (1967) * Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid (1969) * Tell Them Willie Boy Is Here (1969) * Jeremiah Johnson (1972) * The Candidate (1972) * The Hot Rock (1972) * The Sting (1973) * The Way We Were (1973) * The Great Gatsby (1974) * Three Days of the Condor (1975) * The Great Waldo Pepper (1975) * All the President's Men (1976) * A Bridge Too Far (1977) * The Electric Horseman (1979) * Brubaker (1980) * The Natural (1984) * Out of Africa (1985) * Legal Eagles (1986) * Havana (1990) * Sneakers (1992) * Indecent Proposal (1993) * Up Close & Personal (1996) * Spy Game (2001) * The Last Castle (2001) * All Is Lost (2013) * Captain America: The Winter Soldier (2014) * Pete's Dragon (2016) * The Discovery (2017) === Director === * Ordinary People (1980) * The Milagro Beanfield War (1988) * A River Runs Through It (1992) * Quiz Show (1994) * The Horse Whisperer (1998) * The Legend of Bagger Vance (2000) === Producer === * Chicagoland (2014) ==References== == Other websites == * * the Sundance Institute * Sundance Resort * Category:Kennedy Center honorees Category:Academy Award Honorary Award winners Category:Academy Award winning directors Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning directors Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:1936 births Category:Living people
